<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CurSlots = CurBranches = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcdispatchgroupsbhazardrecognizer/#ae3ba05e93144e92aaeb9cd99504d0147"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcdispatchgroupsbhazardrecognizer/#ae3ba05e93144e92aaeb9cd99504d0147">PPCDispatchGroupSBHazardRecognizer::EmitNoop</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DAG-&gt;MF.getSubtarget&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppcsubtarget">PPCSubtarget</a>&gt;().getCPUDirective();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the group has now filled all of its slots, or if we&#39;re using a special</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// group-terminating nop, the group is complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: the same for P9 as previous gen until POWER9 scheduling is ready</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34aa2b626cb4809ee8a3b3da9d475eabe05">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR6</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34a0c8a5dd168df904e8c29520a47502a61">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR7</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34aa3de856d909c5b0166919bf6e4bd1a3d">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR8</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34a0a03bfd83c00f4d1edab975b7bfe7f36">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR9</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurSlots == 6) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurGroup.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurSlots = CurBranches = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++CurSlots;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PowerPC 970 Hazard Recognizer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This models the dispatch group formation of the PPC970 processor.  Dispatch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// groups are bundles of up to five instructions that can contain various mixes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of instructions.  The PPC970 can dispatch a peak of 4 non-branch and one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch instruction per-cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are a number of restrictions to dispatch group formation: some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions can only be issued in the first slot of a dispatch group, &amp; some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions fill an entire dispatch group.  Additionally, only branches can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// issue in the 5th (last) slot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finally, there are a number of &quot;structural&quot; hazards on the PPC970.  These</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditions cause large performance penalties due to misprediction, recovery,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and replay logic that has to happen.  These cases include setting a CTR and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branching through it in the same dispatch group, and storing to an address,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then loading from the same address within a dispatch group.  To avoid these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// conditions, we insert no-op instructions when appropriate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This is missing some significant cases:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   1 Modeling of microcoded instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   2 Handling of serialized operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   3 Handling of the esoteric cases in &quot;Resource-based Instruction Grouping&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppchazardrecognizer970/#a64f6635ee2148d5abf526f462a0c0890"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppchazardrecognizer970/#a64f6635ee2148d5abf526f462a0c0890">PPCHazardRecognizer970::PPCHazardRecognizer970</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag">ScheduleDAG</a> &amp;DAG)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : DAG(DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EndDispatchGroup();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCHazardRecognizer970::EndDispatchGroup() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9a7b5c68c90f85baaedaa854cc5002cc">errs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;=== Start of dispatch group\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NumIssued = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Structural hazard info.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  HasCTRSet = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = NumStores; i != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a92f4283d4e0e2ea1776894b3ae93640f">e</a>; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StoreSize&#91;NumStores&#93; = MO-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinememoperand/#a0ffa31699dee0349f9b9ae1d3ccb21f1">getSize</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/locationsize/#a935a116f6c8690449f4eddd56a99504b">getValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++NumStores;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsimilarity/#af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bd">InstrType</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppcii/#aebfd14c5a918997e894a9698f27c58e6ad3d339fe9c9bdedb6a7c90a2c58f4fad">PPCII::PPC970&#95;BRU</a> || isSingle)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumIssued = 4;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Terminate a d-group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++NumIssued;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this instruction is cracked into two ops by the decoder, remember that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we issued two pieces.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isCracked)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++NumIssued;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumIssued == 5)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EndDispatchGroup();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
